timeline.bodyText: Why does this link to pricing? Is there a better page of documentation which discusses how long a revision will be maintained?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -612,8 +612,10 @@ /** * Lists chronological/historical representation of {@link ConfigurationSetting} resource(s). Revisions are provided - * in descending order from their {@link ConfigurationSetting#getLastModified() lastModified} date. Revisions expire - * after a period of time. The service maintains change history for up to 7 days. + * in descending order from their {@link ConfigurationSetting#getLastModified() lastModified} date. + * Revisions expire after a period of time. + *

See Pricing + * for more information.

replies.bodyText: key History in pricing. Price = free, 7 days; Price = standard, 30 days. Keep it as link as we don't want to set it to fixed.
replies.author: mssfang

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/appconfiguration/azure-data-appconfiguration/src/main/java/com/azure/data/appconfiguration/ConfigurationAsyncClient.java b/sdk/appconfiguration/azure-data-appconfiguration/src/main/java/com/azure/data/appconfiguration/ConfigurationAsyncClient.java index 0725d092dc9..0f09fbf3582 100644 --- a/sdk/appconfiguration/azure-data-appconfiguration/src/main/java/com/azure/data/appconfiguration/ConfigurationAsyncClient.java +++ b/sdk/appconfiguration/azure-data-appconfiguration/src/main/java/com/azure/data/appconfiguration/ConfigurationAsyncClient.java @@ -613,8 +613,7 @@ public final class ConfigurationAsyncClient { /** * Lists chronological/historical representation of {@link ConfigurationSetting} resource(s). Revisions are provided * in descending order from their {@link ConfigurationSetting#getLastModified() lastModified} date. - * Revisions expire after a period of time. - *

See Pricing + * Revisions expire after a period of time, see Pricing * for more information.

* * If {@code selector} is {@code null}, then all the {@link ConfigurationSetting ConfigurationSettings} are fetched

timeline.bodyText:
I think we should leave the last sentence as a single sentence, no need to break it up due to the hyperlink. Suggested change * Revisions expire after a period of time. *

See Pricing * for more information.

* Revisions expire after a period of time, see this documentation * for more information.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

@@ -398,8 +398,11 @@ public ConfigurationSetting setReadOnly(String key, String label, boolean isRead /** * Lists chronological/historical representation of {@link ConfigurationSetting} resource(s). Revisions are provided - * in descending order from their {@link ConfigurationSetting#getLastModified() lastModified} date. Revisions expire - * after a period of time. The service maintains change history for up to 7 days. + * in descending order from their {@link ConfigurationSetting#getLastModified() lastModified} date. + * Revisions expire after a period of time. + *

See Pricing + * for more information.

timeline.message: no break line for hyper link
